lead_paragraph: Rich Hill gave host Los Angeles six innings of two-hit pitching, and Yasmani Grandal and Justin Turner each homered as Chicago starter Jake Arrieta yielded four runs in five innings.

headline.content_kicker: Dodgers 6, Cubs 0 | Los Angeles leads series, 2-1
headline.print_headline: Fans Are Raucous as Pitchers Silence Cubs
headline.main: Dodgers Shut Out Cubs Again and Take 2-1 N.L.C.S. Lead
headline.kicker: Dodgers 6, Cubs 0 | LOS ANGELES LEADS SERIES, 2-1

snippet: Rich Hill gave host Los Angeles six innings of two-hit pitching, and Yasmani Grandal and Justin Turner each homered as Chicago starter Jake Arrieta yielded four runs in five innings....
abstract: Los Angeles Dodgers beat Chicago Cubs, 6-0, to take 2-1 lead in National League Championship Series.
